content:
Justin McDonald's passion for the art of handwriting old ads is truly inspiring. He rewrites hundreds of them daily, long-hand, for fun, with the belief that it helps him develop his copywriting skills and stay connected to the roots of the industry. Through his daily handwritten ads on his website and social media platforms, he provides a unique perspective on the history of advertising and its relevance to modern-day marketing.

Apart from his daily practice, Justin offers a monthly printed newsletter for $100 that covers a wide range of topics, including copywriting, small business management, entrepreneurship, personal selling, and personal development. He also provides daily email tips on these subjects, giving his subscribers insights into his copywriting process and approach to business.

Justin's expertise in copywriting has led him to create his own eBooks and publish a book on the subject. He frequently offers special deals and promotions for his products, ensuring that his subscribers have access to the latest and most relevant information in the industry. He also engages in affiliate marketing and joint ventures, expanding his reach and building his network of contacts.

With his range of products and services, Justin offers something for everyone in the world of copywriting and beyond. His commitment to offering valuable insights on copywriting, small business management, entrepreneurship, personal selling, and personal development make him an excellent resource for anyone looking to improve their skills in these areas.

In conclusion, I have learned that Justin McDonald is not only passionate about copywriting but also dedicated to developing his skills and sharing his knowledge with others. He is an excellent example of how consistent practice and commitment can lead to success in any field.
